trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemStyleCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemStyleCollection 類別用來儲存和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the MenuItemStyleCollection class as the underlying data type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項使用 MenuItemStyleCollection 類別為基礎的資料類型的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> properties are an alternative to the individual style properties (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>屬性都是個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are applied to regular menu items and the selected menu item, respectively, based on the menu item's level in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性會套用至規則的功能表項目和選取的功能表項目分別根據功能表中功能表項目層級。

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the menu item style for the first level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一個層級的功能表的功能表項目樣式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the menu item style for the second level of the menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至功能表項目樣式，第二個層級的功能表上，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> properties are most often used to generate menus where menu items at a certain level have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>屬性最常用來產生功能表在特定層級的功能表項目具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemStyleCollection class inherits most of its members from the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemStyleCollection 類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>的大部分成員

trans-unit.source: For more information on the inherited members, see <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關繼承成員的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的附加<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>物件至目前集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Add 方法附加指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件集合的結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object into the collection at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件插入集合中特定索引使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to append to the end of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>来附加至目前集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the added <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 加入之以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>物件位於集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Contains 方法來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件包含在集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item style from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來測試是否存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件之前執行的工作，例如加入或移除集合中的功能表項目樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>尋找。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>包含在集合; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從所有的項目複製<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"></xref>物件到相容的一維陣列的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>目標陣列中指定索引處開始的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection> object into the specified zero-based array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要複製的內容使用 CopyTo 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>成為指定的以零為起始的陣列物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目標陣列的指定索引處開始複製的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the array to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可以使用陣列來存取集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> objects that received the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>物件接收複製的項目從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: 要開始接收複製的內容的目標陣列中的位置。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷指定的以零為起始的索引使用 IndexOf 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>集合中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點不是在集合中，則方法會傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件在集合中出現多次，就會傳回第一次出現的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>找出。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個出現項目以零起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>，如果找到則為-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>物件插入集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object into the collection at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 使用插入方法插入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>集合中指定以零為起始的索引處的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object to the end of the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件的集合結尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的以零為起始的索引位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>從集合指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object from the collection at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個索引子來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>從集合中使用陣列標記法指定索引處的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to access, modify, or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 索引子可讓您存取、 修改或取代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>直接在集合中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>擷取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用移除方法來移除指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>集合中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that menu item style are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然後遵循該功能表項目樣式的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移動項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>使用特定索引處的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"> </xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> object at the specified index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>從集合指定的索引位置的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object at the specified zero-based index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RemoveAt 方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件在集合中指定以零為起始的索引位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然後遵循該節點的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移動項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以移除特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引位置的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
